Translations.Text: D lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi ur Ipxallaf ara lemaahda S, maca, tegwti n medden ur ssinen
Ssnen ayen id innunnten, di tmeddurt n ddunit. Â£ef laxeot nitni stehzan
Day ur meyyzen ara deg iman nnsen? Ur Ixliq Oebbi tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep, akked lajel ipwassnen. Ih, aias n medden i inekoen timlilit d Mass nnsen

Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Llan ifen ten tazmert, $zan tamurt, $elben ten akken i p aamoen. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Ur ten Idnis Oebbi. Maca d nitni i idensen iman nnsen
D$a teqsee taggara n laaouo. Skaddben issekniyen n Oebbi. Pmmaaliken fellasen
Oebbi Inezzu lxelq; sinna, Ippales it id. Sinna, $uoeS ara tu$alem
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, ad feqaen ibe$wviyen
Ur ten pselliken wid pcaraken. Ad nekoen wid pcaraken
Ass ideg ara d ijbu yimir, assen ad mfaoaqen
Wanag wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ad zhun di tebeirt
